GameDisplay.question: Whas this digit displayed two turns ago ?

Introduction.remember: Will you remember two digits ago?

Rules.gameOver: You must do better! I believe in you, just a little more!
Rules.remember: At every turn remember the displayed digit.
Rules.answer: When we ask you if the displayed digit was shown two turns ago, you must answer correctly!

Footer.site: I realised this website just for fun and showing my knowledges: I am a French developer available for Bordeaux and Paris, here is my'

Legal.seeCookies: You can watch the cookies this website stored on your machine at
Legal.allCookies: All the cookies this website can store on your machine, after your consent, are these:

cookiesList.theme: theme: website style theme details if modified.
cookiesList.session: session: if you logged in, the website can then remember it.

Legal.privacyIntro: I do not share nor resell any of your personnal data. Everything is detailed bellow, I use Google's servers to store your email and scores, and full control is yours. You will not receive emails from me.
Legal.whenCreatingAccount: When you create an account, I ask several private data:
Legal.emailToFirebase: Your email adress is stored inside Google's databases via its service Firebase.
Legal.passHash: Your password does not leave your machine. I send Google's databases only a hash of your password. A hash is some sort of a key that allows to confirm your password without being able to guess it.
Legal.update: You can update your password and your email, or delete your account from the
Legal.askYourData: You can ask all the data I have about you from
Legal.deleteAccount: By deleting your account, I erase all data about you on Google's servers: Email, password's hash, scores.

More.airFrance: This project is inspired by the psychotechnical tests to be performed to become a pilot at Air France.
More.excellentPilotest: has developed excellent tests of this nature, must see!
